snippet: The surprise defeat of Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, the No. 2 House Republican, at the hands of David Brat, a college economics professor, shook the party and raised questions for the party’s leadership in Congress.
abstract: The surprise defeat of Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, the No. 2 House Republican, at the hands of David Brat, a college economics professor, shook the party and raised questions for the party’s leadership in Congress.

headline.main: What's News in Washington: Cantor's Stunning Loss
